mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TItemInfoMgmt(ItemName, ItemPrice, AdminNo, FileName, FileUrl ,FileOriName) VALUES( #{strItemName}, #{intItemPrice}, #{intAdminNo}, #{strfileName}, #{strfileUrl}, #{strfileOriName})
mapper.select: SELECT ItemNo AS intItemNo ,ItemName AS strItemName ,ItemPrice AS intItemPrice ,ItemDate AS dateItemDate ,AdminId AS strAdminId ,UpdateItemDate AS dateUpdateItemDate ,FileUrl AS strfileUrl FROM TItemInfoMgmt INNER JOIN TAdmin ON TItemInfoMgmt.AdminNo = TAdmin.AdminNo WHERE UseFlag NOT IN(0) ORDER BY ItemDate DESC
SELECT ItemNo AS intItemNo ,ItemName AS strItemName ,ItemPrice AS intItemPrice ,FileUrl AS strfileUrl FROM TItemInfoMgmt WHERE ItemNo NOT IN(0) AND UseFlag NOT IN(0) ORDER BY ItemDate DESC

SELECT TOP 12 resultTable.* FROM (SELECT TOP (12 * #{curPage}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ItemDate DESC) AS rownumber ,ItemNo AS intItemNo ,ItemName AS strItemName ,ItemPrice AS intItemPrice ,FileUrl AS strfileUrl ,CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),ItemDate,121) AS strdate FROM TItemInfoMgmt WHERE ItemNo NOT IN(0) AND UseFlag NOT IN(0) ) AS resultTable WHERE rownumber > (#{curPage} - 1) * 10

SELECT ItemNo AS intItemNo ,ItemName AS strItemName ,ItemPrice AS intItemPrice ,FileUrl AS strfileUrl FROM TItemInfoMgmt WHERE ItemNo NOT IN(0) AND UseFlag NOT IN(0) AND ${keyField} LIKE '%${keyWord}%'

SELECT TOP 12 resultTable.* FROM (SELECT TOP (12 * #{curPage}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ItemDate DESC) AS rownumber ,ItemNo AS intItemNo ,ItemName AS strItemName ,ItemPrice AS intItemPrice ,FileUrl AS strfileUrl ,CONVERT(NVARCHAR(10),ItemDate,121) AS strdate FROM (SELECT * FROM TItemInfoMgmt WHERE ${keyField} LIKE '%${keyWord}%') AS TSearch WHERE ItemNo NOT IN(0) AND UseFlag NOT IN(0) ) AS resultTable WHERE rownumber > (#{curPage} - 1) * 10
SELECT ItemNo AS intItemNo ,ItemName AS strItemName ,ItemPrice AS intItemPrice ,FileUrl AS strfileUrl FROM TItemInfoMgmt WHERE ItemNo = #{itemNo}
SELECT UserNo AS intUserNo ,UserName AS strUserName ,UserPhone AS strUserPhone ,UserPostCode AS strPostCode ,UserAdress AS strAdress ,UserAdress2 AS strAdress2 FROM TUser WHERE UserNo = #{userNo}
SELECT ItemNo AS intItemNo ,ItemPrice AS intItemPrice ,ItemName AS strItemName ,FileOriName AS strfileOriName ,FileUrl AS strfileUrl FROM TItemInfoMgmt WHERE ItemNo = #{itemNo}

SELECT a.PurchaseNo AS intNumber ,a.ItemNo AS intItemNo ,b.ItemName AS strItemName ,a.TotalItemPrice AS intItemTotalPrice ,a.PurchaseDate AS datePurchaseDate ,a.Flag AS intFlag ,c.UserId AS strUserId ,c.UserName AS strUserName FROM TItemPurchaseMst a, TItemInfoMgmt b, Tuser c WHERE a.ItemNo = b.ItemNo AND a.UserNo = c.UserNo ORDER BY a.PurchaseNo DESC

SELECT a.PurchaseNo AS intNumber ,a.ItemNo AS intItemNo ,b.ItemName AS strItemName ,a.TotalItemPrice AS intItemTotalPrice ,a.PurchaseDate AS datePurchaseDate ,a.Flag AS intFlag FROM TItemPurchaseMst a, TItemInfoMgmt b WHERE a.ItemNo = b.ItemNo AND a.UserNo = #{userNo} ORDER BY a.PurchaseNo DESC
SELECT InvoiceNumber AS intInvoiceNumber ,CompanyCode AS intCompanyCode FROM TDeliveryInfoMst WHERE PurchaseNo = #{purchaseNo}
